title: MEZZO font
content:
Does anyone know the font used on MEZZO cable station?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111124940im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22761.gif)
author: adriano

comments.content: I'm going to guess it's a custom chop of DIN. The M, E and Z all look like DIN. The O seems to be a circle without any horizontal thinning. Just a guess though.
